name: Show Sim Info
description: View all of the internal data for particular sims with an interaction. Originally by Itasan on MTS.
downloadWarning: If you have downloaded this mod from Mod The Sims, delete that version before installing this one. Note that using a cloud service (OneDrive, Google Drive, iCloud, etc.) to back up your Mods folder can cause files to stick around even after you think you've deleted them.
